Query¶

TODO

# load the query module
from rnaiutilities import Query
# create a query object
q = Query(<your db file>)
# do a query
res = q.query(library="d", featureclass="cells", gene="star", sample=10)
# print to tsv
res.dump("~/Desktop/bla.tsv")
